title: Anyone potentially interest in a Gold 4 account?
body:
I'm thinking about deleting LoL as its affecting my life too heavily. I've noticed I've been having difficulties with the game due to the amount of abuse I'm getting, I'm so stressed out that I'm literally pulling beard hair out. When I get some wins I feel great but I'm finding im losing more and more, leaving me unable to sleep. Some days I don't even eat until I get a win, that can be over 8 hours. All of this because some jerk hacked my account and dropped it out of Platinum. 

I understand that it's just a game and that's why I'm thinking I should give my account away. I just can't deal with the abuse and bullies that I constantly get in games.

replies.body: Just letting you know I've contacted some of the riot players i know personally and requested your account be flagged.
It wouldn't be sold, I would give it away
Still against the TOU and EULA. Any form of transferring "ownership" of an account is punishable with the highest in-game punishments (aka the permaban).
what champions do you have on it?
Pretty much all of them, whole bunch of legacy/rare skins and over 100K IP
You know that account will be banned right?

Riot has probably seen this thread and they're just waiting for the right moment to strike this account with a perma ban, you have pretty much confirmed this account will be going to someone else, no matter what you do, Riot will be banning this account.

You can simply tell Riot to permaban your account, they will do it for you.

And no, selling account isn't legal in Riot's rulebook, and you're playing their game.
It wouldn't be sold, I would most likely give it away. And it's tempting I might have to look into that option

Account sharing is also not allowed by Riot, but you're not sharing with somebody as you plan to simply not touch it anymore.

So I am not sure whether if the case of giving accounts away or in other words, selling your account for exactly 0 dollar, is allowed or otherwise.

But as I said, I think there were people in the same situation as you. What they did was simply asking Riot to permaban their account.

> So I am not sure whether if the case of giving accounts away or in other words, selling your account for exactly 0 dollar, is allowed or otherwise.

Still against Riots rules. Any form of transferring "ownership" of an account is against the TOU and EULA.

I think you should keep it too~


I hope you feel better!

You could try giving ranked a break, and just having fun with some of your friends in normals~

Don't give it away man, you'll regret it.

I suggest you tell Riot to ban the account until you say so, lets say confirmation from a Riot Support ticket. That way your account will be secure while you can still access it whenever you want, but not easily.

Uninstall too if you haven't already, I only read through your post quickly
